text:
Hii, Chitranshi !!
Remember, we first met in that PE class. I don't remember exactly what we talked that timeğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… but I still remember those 1st year's TA labs, how we used to make those drawings?ğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰ I can't forget that you helped me many times as you somehow used to get  the solutions to those drawings. I never thanked you  for that So i thanku here. We never talked much after those days. You might have thought, I'm something like a egoistic and nerdy, I don't know why it happened like that, but believe me I am neither like that. 

What I see as you are a very helping, happy and nice person. I hope we'll meet again sometime in future. Good Luck !! Always Stay happy.ğŸ™‚ğŸ™‚
author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma

text:

BEst luck.
author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma

text:
Hii Partner!!
I shared those happy memories in TA201 lab with you guys. These reminds me a happy, chatty aur innocent girl,  I still remember those lab k beech wali talksğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ƒ poori lab baatein karte hi nikal jaati thi, halanki majdoori bhi bahut kari. Kaafi baatein share kari humne, m feel very good and fortunate for those chats and lovely memories. ğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜Œ

Finally, yahi kahunga aise hi hasste, muskurate rahna. Hope milenge kaabhi. Good luck. Bye bye ğŸ‘‹ ğŸ‘‹

author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma

text:
Sachin Bhai,
Hum log jayda samay se nhi pehchante  ek dusre ko. Tu room pe aata tha Suhail se milne, chemical dept. ka banda hai itna hi kuch janta tha tere baare mae.  Lekin iss saal campus waps aaye toh thodi aachi jaan pehchan hui tujhse. Kaafi simple aur saanth swabhav ka genuine insaan hai tu. Kaafi shi tha na Saath mae baithke IPL mae saate k liye team banate,  match dekhte the, akhirkar tujhko bhi sasta satori bana diya tha. Bajpai, Shrey, mae baaki loog k saath Badminton, cricket waegra khelte the. Kuch din  aur mazze karte aise hi lekin corono ne ma ch**a li.  Lekin koi baat nhi , kaafi aachi memories bhi toh banayi hai. 

Good luck for your future !! Always keep your simplicity and Stay happy. ğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ƒ

PS: Maine suna bahot kanjush hai tu.  ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma

text:
Bhai Shashi,  Yaad hai humlog sabse phele mile the Madhesiya k room pe, jaab bapu humse milne aaye the 1st day shaam ko. Taab se leke, kaafi saari aachi memories banayi hai saath mae.  Yaad hai kaise aapn, CC mae baitheke MCM k form bhare the, tera aur madhesiya ka. Woh khushi jaab MCM aayi thi first time.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Saath mae CC mae ghanto taak baithe rahte the 1st sem mae. (Tu seriously padhta tha mae bakchodi karta). Waise library kaam jate the 1st year mae toh, halanki baadme library jate the aptop laane k baad. 
Hamri dono dosto ki hi jodi thi phele, lekin shubham se jaanpehchan hone k baad to suhail aapn teeno ne khoob maaze kare hai, hamri 1st year summer bhaut  yaadgar thi, tumlog 10k jeete satte mae, bhai kya hi maze kare uss time, alag hi din the. Amritsar wali trip toh nhi gaya tha mae lekin Manali trip k woh 4-5 din hamesha mere life ke one of the best days rahne wale hai. 3rd year ki trip pending rah gayi apni. Lekin aur ek trip jarur karenge aapn saab saath mae.  Iss saal april mae milte. Main aur bajpai kaafi aacha khelne lage hai badminton, campus aane k baad, bihari, suhail aur tere saath khelna tha yaar lekin yeh corono ne saab pe paani pher diya.ğŸ˜’ğŸ˜’

Phone pe toh jayda hui nhi hai baat apni lekin aapn jaurur milenge dobara. Chaapu toh bahot hai tu bhai. Toh badiya se chapte rhana jana bhi rhe tu. Best wishes for your future. Aise hi hamesha haste and muskurate rahna. ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—

-Tumhara Priye Mitra
  Dhiru ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma

text:
Shrey bhai !! 
Ekdam shuru se shuru karte hai. Yaad hai hum first time mile the, apni pehli Galaxy k samay HSS k liye. Wha tu, Divyanshu, Saurabh Sharma aur baaki logo k saath aacha experience rha tha haalanki who alag baat hai mae jayada dino taak tika nhi wha ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. 
Lekin jab hum Mod. Phy group mae mile, kya kya karnamae kare hai hum logo ne saath. Woh moment toh kaise hi bhul sakte hai, kaal lab project ka presentation hai aur ek din pehle Shubham, tu, mae lab mae experiment ka setup karne lage hai. Finally, saab kuch kar kara k, tu raat ki neend ka maara kahta hai, Ek jhapki leta hu, phir fatafat experiment shuru karte hai.  Aur kuch shhan paschaat hi, Jis tube se hum readings lene wale the,  ussse maine aur Shubham ne Helium ko bandaan se mukt kar diya. Baaki tumhare jagne ne baad ke drashya aur krtya avismarnaeey hai. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Lekin chaap diya tha presentation mae agle din. ğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ƒ
Ek dusrre k saath se humne kai courses pass kiye hai aur chaape bhi hai. Mae yeh jarur kahna chaunga, bhai hamara hai superly optimistic, dil ka bhaut saaf, aur confidence toh inki waani k pratyek shabd se jahalkta hai. Hamaisa mast raho aur muskarte raho. ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—
Aur milte hai jald hi waps.
PS: Halanki mera yearbook aur memoir wagera ka maan nhi tha, but tera aur baaki dosto ka itna utsah deknke maine bhi finally phela memoir likh diya. profile ka toh kabada hi macha diya tha maine, kuch bhi likha.ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… Aur kyu nhi  yhi cheeze jo yaad aayengi.ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
author: Dheeraj Kumar Verma
